Key Match Events: Andy Ibáñez hit a pinch-hit bases-clearing double off closer Josh Hader
Post-Match Reflections: A.J. Hinch said, 'I don't know who, but somebody let the Tigers get hot.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers ended the Astros’ run of seven consecutive trips to the AL Championship Series
Others: The Tigers will face the AL Central-rival Guardians in a best-of-five AL Division Series beginning Saturday afternoon in Cleveland.
